about_the_game:
If you're creating a medical bay, a modern day hospital or just want to equip a medical cabinet for the player to loot, the GameGuru MAX Modern Day Mini Kit - First Aid is for you. Containing more than 35 high quality, fully GameGuru MAX-ready assets, this pack from artist Kraven3D is perfect for adding that extra emergency detail.

The GameGuru MAX Modern Day Mini Kit - First Aid is part of our growing ranges of amazing value mini-kits designed to expand on existing DLC, and contains a mix of first aid items, such as health pickups, scissors, bottles and props, ideal for Modern Day and Sci-Fi games.

Dream it - Build it - Play it!
